description: Try our easy to follow Spinach & Ricotta Gnudi recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spinach & Ricotta Gnudi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide gnudi between serving plates. Top with tomato sauce, remaining parmesan and basil. Season and serve.
